import React, { useState } from "react"; import Navbar from "../Navbar"; // adjust path if needed import "./recentstyle.css"; export default function DoctorRecentPrescriptionsPage() { const [patientId, setPatientId] = useState(""); const handleSearch = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log("Search patient:", patientId); }; return (
